text: Nyasaye yalaka balia basubila mwinywe mana nibakhola ebikhole ebilayi , mbu alabakhola okhuba abalenji be khushialo, shingala yakhola balia abaliho imbeli wabu. Netoto alabatinyisilia idini yabu aya yabachamila, ne alabakalukhanilia omulembe okhurula khubuyendi bwabu. Bamulamenje nibalamutsokasiakhwo nende shiosi shiosi tawe. Ne balia balakhaya, imbeli wa ako, abo nibo bafunakanga amalako kefu
